search.query:
| mstats avg(_value) as usage WHERE metric_name="kube.pod.cpu.usage_rate" AND "index"="em_metrics" BY pod-name span=auto | append [ | mstats avg(_value) as limit WHERE metric_name="kube.pod.cpu.request" AND index="em_metrics" BY name span=auto | rename name as pod-name ] | eval resource = "cpu"
| append [ | mstats avg(_value) as usage WHERE metric_name="kube.pod.memory.usage_bytes" "index"="em_metrics" BY pod-name span=auto | eval usage=usage/1024/1024 | append [ | mstats avg(_value) as limit WHERE metric_name="kube.pod.memory.request" index="em_metrics" BY name span=auto | rename name as pod-name ] | eval resource = "memory" ]
| lookup instances _key as pod-name OUTPUT stack_id role | where isnotnull(stack_id) and isnotnull(role) | lookup stacks _key as stack_id OUTPUT title as stack cluster deployment_type | search cluster="$cluster$" | stats avg(usage) as usage min(limit) as limit by _time resource role stack | streamstats limit=0 last(limit) as limit2 last(usage) as usage2 by resource pod-name | eval limit = coalesce(limit,limit2) | eval usage = coalesce(usage,usage2) | fields - limit2 usage2 | eval usage_pct = (usage / limit) * 100
stats max(usage_pct) as usage_pct by _time role stack | stats max(usage_pct) as usage_pct by _time stack | timechart limit=0 max(usage_pct) as usage_pct by stack

table.title: Top Utilisation by Stack Role Resource

search.query: stats sparkline(avg(usage_pct)) as sparkline latest(usage_pct) as usage_pct by resource role stack | sort - usage_pct | head 50 | table stack role resource *
